entry_points.name: set
entry_points.description: Replaces the current value with the passed argument.

entry_points.name: flip
entry_points.description: Replaces the current value with the opposite value.

arguments.name: odra_cfg_package_hash_key_name
arguments.description: The arg name for the package hash key name.

arguments.name: odra_cfg_allow_key_override
arguments.description: If true and the key specified in odra_cfg_package_hash_key_name already exists, it will be overwritten.

arguments.name: odra_cfg_is_upgradable
arguments.description: The arg name for the contract upgradeability setting.

arguments.name: odra_cfg_is_upgrade
arguments.description: The arg name for telling the installer that the contract is being upgraded.
